attributes.action: If May's deal gets a 3rd rejection, the UK should leave with a No Deal
attributes.background: If May's deal gets a 3rd rejection, the UK should leave with a No Deal. The option to revoke Article 50 should not even be an option as 17.4 million people voted to Leave, and WON! So the Government should revoke the earlier rejection of a No Deal and give the majority what they voted for.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign one of these petitions if it calls for what you'd like to happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
